summary: This is a memorandum from the Department of Justice Office of the Inspector General (OIG) documenting a voluntary interview conducted on June 14, 2021, with a BOP Lieutenant regarding the investigation into the death of inmate Jeffrey Epstein. The interview focuses on the Lieutenant's role and activities at the MCC New York on August 9, 2019, the day before Epstein was found dead.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the OIG investigation; a federal inmate who was found unresponsive in his cell at MCC New York on August 10, 2019.

persons.name: Lieutenant
persons.role: Acting Activities Lieutenant at MCC New York
persons.context: A BOP Lieutenant stationed at FCI Danbury who was interviewed by OIG agents. He was the Acting Activities Lieutenant at MCC New York on August 9, 2019.

persons.name: Senior Special Agent
persons.context: Conducted the voluntary interview of the BOP Lieutenant as part of the OIG investigation into Epstein's death.

persons.name: Special Agent
persons.context: Conducted the voluntary interview of the BOP Lieutenant alongside the Senior Special Agent.

persons.name: Preparer
persons.context: Individual who prepared this OIG memorandum of investigation.

persons.name: Reviewer
persons.context: Individual who reviewed the prepared OIG memorandum.

connections.description: The OIG Senior Special Agent interviewed the BOP Lieutenant as part of the official investigation into Jeffrey Epstein's death.
The OIG Special Agent participated in the interview of the BOP Lieutenant regarding the Epstein death investigation.
The Lieutenant was the Acting Activities Lieutenant at the MCC New York where Epstein was housed on August 9, 2019, the day before Epstein's death.

events.title: OIG Interview of BOP Lieutenant
events.description: Senior Special Agent and Special Agent from the DOJ OIG conducted a voluntary interview of a BOP Lieutenant regarding the death of Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Jeffrey Epstein Found Unresponsive
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein was found unresponsive within his cell at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, New York.

events.title: Lieutenant's Shift Before Epstein's Death
events.description: The interviewed BOP Lieutenant served as the Acting Activities Lieutenant at MCC New York, the day before Epstein was found dead.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York, New York, New York
keyFacts: The DOJ Office of the Inspector General (OIG) was conducting an official investigation into the death of BOP inmate Jeffrey Epstein.
A BOP Lieutenant, who was the Acting Activities Lieutenant at MCC New York on August 9, 2019, was interviewed in connection with this investigation.
The interview was recorded and transcribed, and several documents from MCC New York, including daily assignment rosters and count sheets from August 9-10, 2019, were referenced.
The document is an internal OIG memorandum that contains neither recommendations nor conclusions and is restricted from distribution outside the receiving agency.
